sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./ProductListItem.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductListItem = ({id, imgNo, productName, productPriceFormatted, productPromotion, productInfo, productReview, productGrade}) => { const productPrice = productPriceFormatted.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); return (
  • {productName}
  • {productPrice}원 {productPromotion}%
  • {productInfo}
  • 리뷰 {productReview} 평점 * {productGrade}/5
) }; //ProductList export default ProductListItem;
